title: Planet Fitness to Buy Franchisee Sunshine Fitness for $800 Million
sub_head: The first franchisee in Planet Fitness system, Sunshine Fitness operates 114 locations in U.S. Southeast
body:
Planet Fitness Inc. on Tuesday said it agreed to buy Sunshine Fitness Growth Holdings LLC, one of its top franchisees, for $800 million in cash and stock.
Planet Fitness said Sunshine Fitness, the first franchisee in its system, operates 114 locations in Alabama, Florida, Georgia, North Carolina and South Carolina.
